column4: i can't switch any desktop! how is it possible? Could anyone help me?
did you try ctrl-alt and the arrow keys?
when i used the live cd everything goes right, now i cant... both with ctrl+alt+arrow or by clicking the desktop switcher
oh with the live cd the desktops can be switched... but not when you actually installed ubuntu on the harddrive?
right... is exactly as you say
maybe is because i installed also compiz config setting manager...
but all others effects goes right
did you try to lower the effects to normal just to check whether it has to do with the more complex effects?
so you say to disable effects? but with 8.10 everything was ok :(
yeah but will you live like this forever? just change it for a seconds to check whether this is the reason for your problem. :)
ok with normal effects everything goes right :(
so, did you try to update to the latest compiz?
i tried to re-activate effects and now works... what do you think was the problem?
yeah i just installed it so i think is the lastest
more complex effects only work with better graphics cards. maybe you have a graphics card that is very special? =)
i have a nvidia geforce 8400M... dont look so bad :D
check on the compiz website. I think I saw a compatibility list
